citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:57 PM on
01-Mar-17.
Called licensee from the driveway, as his dogs have access to the yard. The licensee answered and said he was
not home and unable to conduct an inspection.
